  • Classes in science.aist.machinelearning.core used by science.aist.machinelearning.algorithm 
    Class Description
    AbstractAlgorithm
    Abstract implementation of Algorithm containing fields common to all algorithms
    Algorithm
    Interface for machine learning algorithm that solves a problem It is based on the concept of Problem and Solution spaces, where one or more Problem Genomes PT can be transformed into one or more Solution Genomes GT
    Configurable
    Defines generic configuration options for classes in Machinelearning
    Problem
    Describes a machine learning problem that needs to be solved A problem consists of genes that are the minimal building blocks of a problem.
    Solution
    Describes a valid solution in the solution space corresponding to a given Problem in the problem space.

  • Classes in science.aist.machinelearning.core used by science.aist.machinelearning.core 
    Class Description
    Algorithm
    Interface for machine learning algorithm that solves a problem It is based on the concept of Problem and Solution spaces, where one or more Problem Genomes PT can be transformed into one or more Solution Genomes GT
    Configurable
    Defines generic configuration options for classes in Machinelearning
    Gene
    An abstract genome of a Type T
    Problem
    Describes a machine learning problem that needs to be solved A problem consists of genes that are the minimal building blocks of a problem.
    ProblemGene
    Specific Implementation of the Gene Class representing a Genome in a machinelearning Problem
    Solution
    Describes a valid solution in the solution space corresponding to a given Problem in the problem space.
    SolutionGene
    Single gene that is usually part of a mapping.
